Class SldStardust

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldStardust
public final class SldStardust extends SldAdvCard
Represents a "Stardust" adventure card in the game. This card type causes players to lose days based on the number of exposed connectors on their ship, simulating the detrimental effect of stardust on unprotected ship components. It extends SldAdvCard and provides specific logic for stardust events.

    • loadStardust

      public static SldStardust loadStardust(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Static factory method to load an SldStardust object from a JSON node. It parses the node to extract ID and level, then constructs a new SldStardust instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the Stardust card data.
      Returns:
      A new SldStardust instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the Stardust card's state and context within the game. It sets up game and fly board references. This card's primary effect is applied immediately upon initialization: all players, in reversed order of the scoreboard, lose days equal to their ship's exposed connectors. The card then transitions directly to the STARDUST_END state, signifying its immediate effect.
      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance managing the current game.

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer()
      Overrides the base method to set the card state to FINALIZED. For the Stardust card, the effect is applied immediately in init, so this method simply transitions to the final state.
      Overrides:
      setNextPlayer in class SldAdvCard
